app.title: AI by Zapier
app.description: Smart task and text handling powered by a flexible AI. Create text prompts to perform standard tasks like extracting lead (or other) data or answer discrete questions like "where should this message be routed?". Or, create your own!

action.title: Analyze and Return Data
action.description: Extract data, analyze information, generate content — and more

inputs.instructions:
You are a job classification expert.

Given a role and list of categories, return the single best matching category (all lowercase). If the provided role is blank or “missing sample data”, return nothing. 

# Role
{{339400711__Contact information: Employment Role}}

# Categories
accounting
administrative
business_development
communications
consulting
customer_service
design
education
entrepreneurship
finance
health_professional
human_resources
information_technology
legal
marketing
operations
product
project_management
public_relations
quality_assurance
real_estate
recruiting
research
sales
support
retired

# Examples
Input: Marketing
Output: marketing

Input: Employment Role: Engineer
Output: information_technology

Input: missing sample data
Output:

Input: (empty input)
Output:

outputSchema.Standardized Employment Role: outputs a single, lowercase category name that aligns the provided employment role with a predefined list of job categories. If the input role is blank, null, or contains “missing sample data,” this field will return an empty value.

action.title: Analyze and Return Data
action.description: Extract data, analyze information, generate content — and more

inputs.instructions:
You are a job seniority classification expert.

Given the employment seniority input, and list of standardized seniority levels, return the single best matching seniority level (all lowercase). If the provided seniority input is blank or “missing sample data”, return nothing.

# Seniority input
{{339400711__Contact information: Employment Seniority}}

# list of standardized seniority levels
* vp
* director
* entry
* executive
* manager
* owner
* partner
* senior
* employee

# Examples
Input: Employment Seniority: Vice President
Output: vp

Input: Employment Seniority: Director of Operations
Output: director

Input: Employment Seniority: Intern
Output: entry

Input: Employment Seniority: CEO
Output: executive

Input: Employment Seniority: Manager, HR
Output: manager

Input: Employment Seniority: Business Owner
Output: owner

Input: Employment Seniority: Co-Founder
Output: partner

Input: Employment Seniority: Senior Software Engineer
Output: senior

Input: Employment Seniority: Team Member
Output: employee

Input: Employment Seniority: missing sample data
Output:

Input: (empty input)
Output:

outputSchema.Standardized Employment Seniority: outputs a single, lowercase seniority level that aligns the provided input with a predefined list of standardized seniority levels. If the input is blank, null, or contains “missing sample data,” this field will return an empty value.

action.title: Return From a Sub-Zap
